sn41.4:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharanti ambāṭakavane.
sn41.4:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn41.4:1.3: “adhivāsentu me, bhante therā, svātanāya gokule bhattan”ti.
sn41.4:1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn41.4:1.6: Atha kho therā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatino gokulaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṃsu.
sn41.4:2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū paṇītena sappipāyāsena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn41.4:2.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū bhuttāvino onītapattapāṇino uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn41.4:2.3: Cittopi kho gahapati “sesakaṃ vissajjethā”ti vatvā there bhikkhū piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
sn41.4:2.4: Tena kho pana samayena uṇhaṃ hoti kuthitaṃ;
sn41.4:2.5: te ca therā bhikkhū paveliyamānena maññe kāyena gacchanti, yathā taṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttāvino.
sn41.4:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahako tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṃghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.4:3.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahako āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:3.3: “sādhu khvassa, bhante thera, sītako ca vāto vāyeyya, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyeyyā”ti.
sn41.4:4.1: “Sādhu khvassa, āvuso mahaka, yaṃ sītako ca vāto vāyeyya, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyeyyā”ti.
sn41.4:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahako tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhari yathā sītako ca vāto vāyi, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusi.
sn41.4:4.4: “yo kho imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṃghe sabbanavako bhikkhu tassāyaṃ evarūpo iddhānubhāvo”ti.
sn41.4:4.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahako ārāmaṃ sampāpuṇitvā āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:4.10: Atha kho therā bhikkhū yathāvihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
sn41.4:5.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā mahako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:5.2: “sādhu me, bhante, ayyo mahako uttari manussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetū”ti.
sn41.4:5.3: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gahapati, ālinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsehī”ti.
sn41.4:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā ālinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsesi.
sn41.4:5.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṃ pavisitvā sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhari yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi, uttarāsaṅgaṃ na jhāpesi.
sn41.4:5.6: Atha kho citto gahapati uttarāsaṅgaṃ papphoṭetvā saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
sn41.4:5.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihārā nikkhamitvā cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:6.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahako senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi.
sn41.4:6.9: Yaṃ macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi, tathā pakkantova ahosi;
